## Description {#details}

Dwarf constants <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/format-provider">format&#95;provider</a>.

Specialization of the <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/format-provider">format&#95;provider</a> template for dwarf enums. Unlike the dumping functions above, these format unknown enumerator values as DW&#95;TYPE&#95;unknown&#95;1234 (e.g. DW&#95;TAG&#95;unknown&#95;ffff).

Definition at line 1224 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/binaryformat/dwarf-h">Dwarf.h</a>.
